root: ^"The work you’ve submitted was so horrible that I won’t even waste my time to look at! How unfortunate that I have such silly rubbish subordinates like you!"
^"How can I take such kind of garbage and hand it over to higher class? Redo all of those damn things!"

s: ^"Ah yeah, so in order to reach the higher groups you even became the member of the “Feast” restaurant?"
^If you are busy connecting with the higher groups, why would you subsidize the doctor?

c-1: ^"How dare you to know and say that?!"
